ITC-Campus Shuttle

Description:

The ITC-Campus Shuttle travels to the Innovative Technologies Complex (ITC) and around campus making stops at Mohawk, Newing, the East and West Gyms, Clearview, Susquehanna, Hillside, and Hinman / Academic A.

Operation Time:

The ITC-Campus Shuttle runs in continuous scheduled loops on Green Buses from 8:00am to 6:00pm on Weekdays in the Winter only.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.

① Leaves Mohawk

② Innovative Technology Center (ITC)

③ Hillside

④ Returns to Mohawk

① ② ③ ④

On weekends the ITC-Campus Shuttle does not run.
